entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:46 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:46 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
